description:
<><><> Etsy shop manual: tutorials, marketing and promotions guide <><><>

You might love this Easy course if you want the latest information about Etsy including navigating its new updated new look and I will even include 40 free listings to get you started creating your store right away. 

In this course you will see how I use my own Etsy store to generate sale and publicity and come and see case studies of very successful Etsy stores and I will go over what you should emulate in order to increase your own sales in your own store. Best of all I will show you all the ways how to do this without having to pay for pricy ads to generate traffic.

Your one stop course to enhance your Etsy seller store success, whatever you have a store already created, you just thinking of starting one or already have one this course is for you. 

In this course you will learn how to increase your sales on Etsy. Etsy is a site just like eBay or Amazon, and you can make a lot of money on Etsy selling either handmade items that you make on your own, or selling vintage or antique items that you can my in places like garage sales or elsewhere where you can find interesting vintage items.

Many people think that you have to make things in order to sell and make money on Etsy, but that is not true. You can sell items that are vintage, and are made by someone else. In this course I will teach you all the ways to increase your sales on Etsy including how to promote your stores and become a successful online seller drawing from my years of experience selling on eBay, Etsy, Amazon and Fiverr. 

You also can see what works to get traffic to your store on Etsy including using YouTube to get organic search traffic, Facebook to get new visitors, and Google AdWords to make sales.  When you combine this with setting up Google analytics to track your user behavior in your store and hiring freelancers to help you manage your store, you will have a powerful combination of practical tips and motivation to take your Etsy store to its full potential!

Cannot wait to start teaching you, sign up today and get to test drive this course for 30 days on me if you do not like it for any reason get a refund if you choose to stay you will be able to receive on Sundays a special promotional offers invitation to my best selling courses as I release them or they go on a limited time sale. If you have not gotten any check your junk or spam mail. 

See you on the inside,

Sincerely,

Sergey
title: ​Etsy shop manual: tutorials, marketing and promotions guide
